page: MI60022: Fundamentals And Applications Of Gps Technologies

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: GPS Fundamentals, GPS in Mapping: Geodesy, Datum, map projections. Aspects of GPS Functioning, GPS in Surveying: Coordinate systems, GPS positioning modes, Static GPS surveying, real time GPS surveying, real time differential GPS, GPS Errors and Biases: Delays, satellite geometry measures, concept of DOP, PDOP, Canopy effect. Ambiguity Resolution, GPS Physics and Data Formats: Data quality, standards and documentation. A brief about GPS sensors and the Physics of GPS functional units. GPS-GIS Integration, GPS Applications
page: MI60022: Fundamentals And Applications Of Gps Technologies
